description: Psygnosis was a British video game development company that published nearly 200 video games between 1984 and 2000. The company is best known for publishing the Lemmings series of games. In 1997, Psygnosis published The City of Lost Children, an action-adventure game based on the movie of the same name. The City of Lost Children included full-motion video cutscenes that were saved as YOP files.
